meta.dc:subject: legislation
meta.dc:rights: the Government of the Hong Kong Special Administrative Region

section.name: s1
section.heading: Vessels to shift berth on request

subsection.name: a
subsection.content: Every master or commanding officer of any vessel berthed alongside any of the company’s wharves shall shift his berth on being requested to do so by an official of the company.

subsection.name: b
subsection.content: On a typhoon signal being hoisted every master or commanding officer of any vessel berthed alongside any of the company’s wharves shall immediately raise steam or otherwise prepare to sail and thereupon leave the wharf on being requested to do so by an official of the company.

section.name: s2
section.heading: Trespassers
section.content: No person unless then in the employment of the company or belonging to or having business with vessels alongside, shall enter or be upon any of the company’s premises without the licence of an official of the company.

section.name: s3
section.heading: Removal of goods, etc., from company’s premises
section.content: No merchandise, cargo, coal, wagon, carriage, cart, truck, crane or other conveyance or machine shall be taken on to or removed from any of the company’s premises without the licence of an official of the company.

section.name: s4
section.heading: Nuisances
section.content: No nuisance of any description shall be committed on or about any of the company’s premises.

section.name: s5
section.heading: Unauthorized vessels not to make fast
section.content: No steamer, vessel, launch, lighter, boat, junk, sampan or other craft of any description shall make fast to, or hold on to, or lay alongside of or block the approaches to any of the company’s wharves without the licence of an official of the company.

section.name: s6
section.heading: Boat steps
section.content: No person shall use the boat steps of the company’s wharves for the landing or delivery of cargo and not more than two launches shall lay alongside the boat steps at any one time.

section.name: s7
section.heading: Smoking
section.content: No person shall smoke inside any of the company’s buildings.

section.name: s8
section.heading: Cranes, gear, etc.
section.content: No person shall interfere, meddle with or move in any way any of the company’s cranes, trucks or other machines or appliances, or make use of its facilities without the permission of an official of the company.

section.name: s9
section.heading: Entry and exit gates
section.content: All pedestrian and vehicular traffic shall enter or leave the company’s premises by the gates from time to time designated for these purposes and shall conform with all instructions of the officials of the company and traffic notices posted on the company’s premises.

section.name: s10
section.heading: Citation
section.content: These by-laws may be cited as the North Point Wharves Limited By-laws.
